Package model

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
model.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Inventory class holds: 1. parts list 2. products list 3. addPart(): adds an incoming part to the parts list 4. addProduct(): adds an incoming product to the products list 5. searchParts(): searches for a part by finding a match with its partToSearch param 6. searchProducts(): searches for a product by finding a match with its partToSearch param RUNTIME_ERROR: incompatible types error occurred in searchProducts() while assigning int to string. fixed by using: String.valueOf FUTURE_ENHANCEMENT:search functions can be improved. search box can autocomplete using a drop-down list.
